class.rdfs:comment: A type of blood vessel that specifically carries blood to the heart.
class.rdfs:label: Vein

schema:drainsTo.rdfs:comment: The vasculature that the vein drains into.
schema:drainsTo.rdfs:label: drainsTo

schema:regionDrained.rdfs:comment: The anatomical or organ system drained by this vessel; generally refers to a specific part of an organ.
schema:regionDrained.rdfs:label: regionDrained

schema:tributary.rdfs:comment: The anatomical or organ system that the vein flows into; a larger structure that the vein connects to.
schema:tributary.rdfs:label: tributary
